017package com.fns.grivet.controller;
018
019import org.json.JSONArray;
020import org.json.JSONObject;
021import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
022import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
023import org.springframework.cloud.context.config.annotation.RefreshScope;
024import org.springframework.http.HttpHeaders;
025import org.springframework.http.MediaType;
026import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
027import org.springframework.messaging.support.MessageBuilder;
028import org.springframework.security.access.prepost.PreAuthorize;
029import org.springframework.util.Assert;
030import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.DeleteMapping;
031import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PatchMapping;
032import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
033import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
034import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestHeader;
035import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
036import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
037import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;
038import com.fns.grivet.model.Op;
039import com.fns.grivet.service.Ingester;
040import io.micrometer.core.instrument.MeterRegistry;
041
042/**
043 * Ingestion end-points
044 *
045 * @author Chris Phillipson
046 */
047@RefreshScope
048@RestController
049@RequestMapping(consumes = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_VALUE, produces = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_VALUE)
050public class IngestController {
051        @SuppressWarnings("all")
052        private static final org.slf4j.Logger log = org.slf4j.LoggerFactory.getLogger(IngestController.class);
053        @Value("${grivet.ingest.batch-size:100}")
054        private int batchSize;
055        private final Ingester ingestService;
056        private final MeterRegistry meterRegistry;
057
058        @Autowired
059        public IngestController(Ingester ingestService, MeterRegistry meterRegistry) {
060                this.ingestService = ingestService;
061                this.meterRegistry = meterRegistry;
062        }
063
064        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'write:type\')")
065        @PostMapping("/type")
066        public ResponseEntity<?> ingestCreateTypeRequest(@RequestHeader("Type") String type, @RequestBody JSONObject payload) {
067                ingestService.ingest(MessageBuilder.withPayload(payload).setHeader("type", type).setHeader("op", Op.CREATE.name()).build());
068                meterRegistry.counter(String.join("ingest", "create", type)).increment();
069                log.info("Successfully ingested create request for type [{}]", type);
070                return ResponseEntity.accepted().build();
071        }
072
073        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'write:type\')")
074        @PostMapping("/types")
075        public ResponseEntity<?> ingestCreateTypesRequest(@RequestHeader("Type") String type, @RequestBody JSONArray array) {
076                int numberOfTypesToCreate = array.length();
077                Assert.isTrue(numberOfTypesToCreate <= batchSize, "The total number of entries in a request must not exceed %d! Your ingest request contained [%d] entries.".formatted(batchSize, numberOfTypesToCreate));
078                JSONObject payload = null;
079                HttpHeaders headers = new HttpHeaders();
080                // allow for all JSONObjects within JSONArray to be processed; capture and report errors during processing
081                for (int i = 0; i < numberOfTypesToCreate; i++) {
082                        try {
083                                payload = array.getJSONObject(i);
084                                ingestService.ingest(MessageBuilder.withPayload(payload).setHeader("type", type).setHeader("op", Op.CREATE.name()).build());
085                                meterRegistry.counter(String.join("ingest", "create", type)).increment();
086                                log.info("Successfully ingested create request for type [{}]", type);
087                        } catch (Exception e) {
088                                String message = LogUtil.toLog(payload, "Problems ingesting type! Portion of payload @ index[%d]\n".formatted(i + 1));
089                                log.error(message, e);
090                                if (numberOfTypesToCreate == 1) {
091                                        throw e;
092                                }
093                                headers.set("Error[%s]".formatted(String.valueOf(i + 1)), e.getMessage());
094                        }
095                }
096                return ResponseEntity.accepted().headers(headers).build();
097        }
098
099        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'write:type\')")
100        @PatchMapping("/type")
101        public ResponseEntity<?> ingestUpdateTypeRequest(@RequestParam(value = "oid", required = true) Long oid, @RequestBody JSONObject payload) {
102                ingestService.ingest(MessageBuilder.withPayload(payload).setHeader("oid", oid).setHeader("op", Op.UPDATE.name()).build());
103                meterRegistry.counter(String.join("ingest", "update")).increment();
104                log.info("Successfully ingested update request for type w/ oid = [{}]", oid);
105                return ResponseEntity.accepted().build();
106        }
107
108        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'delete:type\')")
109        @DeleteMapping("/type")
110        public ResponseEntity<?> ingestDeleteTypeRequest(@RequestParam(value = "oid", required = true) Long oid) {
111                ingestService.ingest(MessageBuilder.withPayload(new JSONObject()).setHeader("oid", oid).setHeader("op", Op.DELETE.name()).build());
112                meterRegistry.counter(String.join("ingest", "delete")).increment();
113                log.info("Successfully ingested delete request for type w/ oid = [{}]", oid);
114                return ResponseEntity.accepted().build();
115        }
116}
